title: PlayStation Buys Another Studio, Next Witcher Game Announced! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.21.22
description:
Blessing and Tim kick off the week with a WILD news day. PlayStation buys another studio! The next Witcher gas been announced! Fortnite removes building!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:48 - Housekeeping
Our Ghostwire Tokyo review is up right now. Greg and Mike have played it and I ask them all about their experience. That’s up right now as a Kinda Funny Gamescast over on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, FargoBrady, & Pranksy
The Roper Report  -
00:06:05 - PlayStation buys Haven Studios - Christopher Dring @ GiBiz
00:15:24 - Is the fact the studio is based in Montreal more of a big deal rather than the actual purchase? - Best Friends Q:Ryan Powala-Higgins
00:24:03 - The next Witcher game is in development - Samit Sarkar @ Polygon
00:36:35 - Unity is releasing a new Tech called Enemies - Jay Peters @ The Verge
00:42:17 - Ad
00:45:18 - Fortnite removes building - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:50:07 - Epic is donating two weeks of Fortnite proceeds to Ukraine relief - Andrew Webster @ The Verge
00:52:30 - Ghostwire: Tokyo review round up
00:56:05 - Netflix announces a Tekken anime - Oli Welsh @ Polygon
01:01:24 - Wii And DSi Shop Channels are down - Zack Zwiezen @ IGN
01:03:55 - Out today
01:04:55 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary
